title: AJ's Serendipity
description: The last thing Greek Alejandro Melonakos expected to find when shopping for food for his restaurant was the love of his life, but that was exactly who he found when he spotted Black American Samara Grossman across the marketplace. Will he be able to convince her of his love and gain hers in return during her five days on vacation, or will his serendipitous find be all for naught?
author: Savannah J. Frierson
